Hi,

have you tried the method getMBeanName of the class Heritrix?
This should return the name of this instance registered in JMX (Only 
available after JMX registration).
I think you can distinguish two hertrix instance by using this method, 
but I haven't tested it.

Hope this helps
Christian


jls_nayak1983 schrieb:
>
> In ohter words I want to know
> " Is there any way to distinguish two hertrix instance if both has
> been instantiated using Heritrix.main() method ? "
>
